remarks: The product of two constant polynomials is a constant polynomial. (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cply1mul.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cply1mul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
cply1mul.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
cply1mul.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` P ) $.
cply1mul $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( F e. B /\ G e. B ) ) -> ( A. c e. NN ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` c ) = .0. /\ ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` c ) = .0. ) -> A. c e. NN ( ( coe1 ` ( F .X. G ) ) ` c ) = .0. ) ) $.
$d .0. c $.
$d .X. c $.
$d F c $.
$d G c $.
